publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2704 Murdo Fraser: Heritage Lottery Fund—That the Parliament congratulates the Heritage Lottery Fund on the publication of its report Sustaining our Living Heritage - Skills and training for the heritage sector and for the support provided to the teaching of traditional skills, helping to maintain these aspects of our national heritage which might otherwise be lost to future generations.
S1M-2704 Heritage Lottery Fund (lodged on 5 February 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2704 Heritage Lottery Fund (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-2704 Murdo Fraser: Heritage Lottery Fund—That the Parliament congratulates the Heritage Lottery Fund on the publication of its report Sustaining our Living Heritage - Skills and training for the heritage sector and for the support provided to the teaching of traditional skills, helping to maintain these aspects of our national heritage which might otherwise be lost to future generations. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-2704 Heritage Lottery Fund (lodged on 5 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2704 Heritage Lottery Fund (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
